title: This London hotel's 'cat committee' have the purrfect jobs
text:
London's Lanesborough hotel has added the most pawsitively purrfect role for cat lovers.

It's the "cat committee."

Because when you have a furmidable feline in the house, you need people to tend to it.

Lilibet the cat came to live at the Lanesborough this summer. She is a Siberian Forest Cat which means she has very fluffy fur, but is hypoallergenic. The cat committee is the small team of cat-loving employees at The Lanesborough who have kindly volunteered to look after Lilibet and post only the most flattering photos of her on the hotel's Instagram.

The Lanesborough London

Lilibet joins Burmese cat Fa-Raon from Le Bristol Paris and Kléopatre from Brenners Park-Hotel & Spa in Baden-Baden, all part of the Oetker Collection of hotels.
description: The Lanesborough London has a new resident cat.
